contents.text: Rome2rio is a travel searching website for showing you how to get from anyway to anyway in the world.
I focused on adding timetables, buying tickets and working on internal tools for updating and creating routes live.
miGenius specialised in creating photo-real raytraced computer generated graphics.
I work on the backend server, frontend Flash and JavaScript clients.
We also created a Trimble SketchUp plugin for syncing the 3d scene with a server for showing a photoreal visualisation of what you are currently working on.
